ygData.subject: Re: Introductions
ygData.msgSnippet: By rank three I am assuming that you mean lvl 8.  That is one of the best lvls for spells  you will definitely need the following: Shock of ice (34dmg for 30
ygData.messageBody:
By rank three I am assuming that you mean lvl 8. That is one of the best
lvls for spells you will definitely need the following:
Shock of ice (34dmg for 30 mana), Fire Bolt(45dmg for 40 mana) be careful
with the fire bolt as it requires a direct line of sight to hit, lesser
shielding is a must as we are very vulnerable and this will be your shield
until lvl 16, resistant skin is good against rat plague disease and spider
poison.

Hope this helped


-----Original Message-----
From: WriterDL@... [SMTP:WriterDL@...]
Sent: Friday, April 16, 1999 2:02 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Introductions

From: WriterDL@...

Greetings and Good day.

I am Gaedin, a 5th level High Elf Wizard on Veeshan who spends his
days
wandering around Kelethin sniping at Orc Centurions. I do actually
have a
question. Could one of you 8+ levelers out there tell me which Rank
3
scrolls are worth buying?

Many Thanks and drop me a line sometime if you want to go hunting...
